description: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education and Professional Studies who are pursuing a degree in any field within Kinesiology and Health Studies. Eligibility Requirements Any undergraduate student who is pursuing a degree in the Kinesiology and Health Studies field Enrolled full-time (12 hours) Minimum of 2.0 GPA Must demonstrate financial need Recipient must be enrolled in the required amount of hours in the upcoming fall and spring semesters in order to be eligible to receive this scholarship Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semesters to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
